Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 10 Mahantaraduka » 10.9 Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaduka » 10.9.7 Pañhāvāra » 10.9.7.1 Paccayānuloma » 10.9.7.1.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Anantarādi
Mahantaraduka
Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaduka
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānuloma
Vibhaṅgavāra
Anantarādi
303.
3062Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo (navapi pañhā cittasahabhūdukasadisā)…  samanantarapaccayena paccayo…  nava…  sahajātapaccayena paccayo…  nava (paṭiccasadisā)…  aññamaññapaccayena paccayo…  nava (paṭiccasadisā)…  nissayapaccayena paccayo…  nava (paccayasadisā)…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (Navapi pañhā cittasahabhūdukasadisā, ninnānākaraṇaṃ.)
<< Adhipatiup Purejātādi >>
